title: Amazing unit in South Loop-w/d in unit and hw floors
posting_body: Interested in this property?

This amazing luxury apartment building, located in the heart of the South Loop, just steps away from restaurants,  shopping, museums, public transportation, parks and Lake Michigan.
Take advantage of this extremely unique concrete  convertible apartment available now.
Pets ok.
Garage parking extra.
No security deposit.

This building has country club style amenities including: -Controlled access building -Outdoor sky garden with private fire pit and BBQ grills -24 hour state of the art fitness center -Resident lounge and wireless cyber cafe -Private park with private dog run -Private rooftop sundeck -24 hour business center -On site dry cleaner and receiving room -Day door staff and concierge services  This unit offers every upgrade imaginable including: -Extremely spacious floor plan -Floor to ceiling windows with unbelievable city views -Washer/dryer in unit -Hardwood flors -Brand
New kitchen including s.s. appliances, and cherry cabinetry with brushed nickel accents
Velocity Apartment Group
*****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.
Thank you.
